name: Contact Form 7 Star Rating
author: themelogger.com

sections.description:
This plugin adds Star Rating fields to Contact Form 7.

Visit the official Contact Form 7 Star Rating page for viewd demo & additional information
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin files to your plugins folder, or install using WordPress built-in Add New Plugin installer
  2. Activate the plugin
  3. Edit a form in Contact Form 7
  4. Choose “Star Rating” from the Generate Tag dropdown
  5. Follow the instructions on the page

1.10

  • Fixed “required field” support. Tested with CF7 4.7 and above.
  • Added form reset js code from “Profitable Web Projects”

1.9

  • Tested WP up to: 4.8.1
  • Tested CF7 up to: 4.9

1.8

Fix “Show number” option

1.7

  • Tested WP up to: 4.2.4
  • Tested CF7 up to: 4.2.2

1.6

  • Tested up to: 4.0

1.5

  • css & js loading paths corrected

1.4

  • js loading paths corrected

1.3

  • Description update

1.2

  • Description update

1.1

  • Unused files removed

1.0

  • Initial release
